name: Handscroll of Immortal Poets [Party]
skill: Increases DMG dealt by 3 allies (melee priority) by 35%/43% for a limited time.
ability: Moderately restores HP to skill targets.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a scroll with the portraits of 36 famous Japanese poets on it. The scroll was divided up into sections by poet and scattered across the land. After much searching, she's managed to recover about half of them, steadily regaining her strength as she goes. Despite looking everywhere for the rest, she hasn't had much progress, which is why she's been accepting jobs further away than she's normally willing to go. You could say a sense of despair is starting to sink in...
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 16/08/17 - 06/09/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 03/09/2017 - 06/09/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the Double Mirror Shard drops by 33% during the "Ghost in the Mirror" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 16/08/17 - 30/08/17

summon: "Hey, you! Seen any of my scrolls around anywhere?"
